metadata.title: CVE-2020-11713 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: wolfSSL 4.3.0 has mulmod code in wc_ecc_mulmod_ex in ecc.c that does not properly resist timing side-channel attacks.

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0+dfsg-2').
